# Gaqno — Dashboards

| Dashboard | For | Content |
|-----------|-----|--------|
| **[Front](/d/gaqno-dashboard-front)** | Frontend | UIs (*-ui), 4xx/5xx by app |
| **[Backend](/d/gaqno-dashboard-backend)** | Backend | Services (*-service), 4xx/5xx by service |
| **[DevOps](/d/gaqno-dashboard-devops)** | Ops / Infra | Host CPU/memory/load, containers, Prometheus, targets |

Use the links above or the dashboard dropdown.
